name: barky
content:
barky adjective
(DOG)
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a loud, rough sound like the bark of a dog: His father issued him a barky order to do his chores. a barky cough Instead of having a musical quality, the opera solo was delivered in a barky shout at one flat volume.
More examplesFewer examplesOur neighbor's barky dog was keeping us up all night.

Animal (non-human) sounds
barky adjective
(TREE)
similar to, or covered with, bark (= the hard outer covering of a tree): Cutting back the old, barky wood will help the shrub grow more in the spring. We could see a squirrel peeking out from the barky crevice of the tree.
